D000001: Harry Potter is a series of fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling.
D000002: Barack Hussein Obama II is an American politician and attorney who served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017.
D000003: Joseph Robinette Biden Jr.  is an American politician who served as the 47th vice president of the United States from 2009 to 2017 and represented Delaware in the U.S. Senate from 1973 to 2009.
